value:
$WmMPID_開花フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Bloom01,Face|Hah! That about settles it, wouldn't
you say? Good match!$k$p$WmMPID_ノア,ch02_42_Noah_M_Normal,Face|Indeed, you've gotten the better of
me. Well done—I'm impressed by
your improvement lately.$k$pYou have come a long way since we
first crossed blades in the arena.$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Bloom01,Face|Thank you! This new world is a little
overwhelming, if I'm honest. It's a
comfort to spar with a familiar face.$k$p$WmMPID_ノア,ch02_42_Noah_M_Normal,Face|Agreed. I am grateful that Father Saul
and Dorothy are here as well.$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Bloom01,Face|Sir Noah, are you all right? I notice
you're favoring your left leg.$k$pCome to think of it, you were favoring
it while we were sparring as well...$k$p$WmMPID_ノア,ch02_42_Noah_M_Normal,Face|So you noticed. Yes, reluctant as I am
to admit it, I sprained my foot in a
recent battle.$k$pFather Saul healed it with his staff,
but it's not fully back to normal yet.$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Bloom01,Face|Oh, no! That's why I won?! I took
advantage of your injured state?!$k$p$WmMPID_ノア,ch02_42_Noah_M_Normal,Face|Fir...$k$p$WmMPID_開花フィル,ch02_01_Fir_F_Bloom01,Face|I'm so sorry! I should have realized.
To think I'd have called that a
victory—how dishonorable of me!$k$pThis is not the path I want to walk.
What a fool I've been—worse than a
fool, a coward!$k$p$WmMPID_ノア,ch02_42_Noah_M_Normal,Face|Hold on a second, Fir! Ah... She must
be very upset to storm off like that.$k$pI do hope she learns not to overthink
things so much. It's going to hurt
her technique...$k$p
